leftBranch.name: Belief in Sacrifice
leftBranch.description: Gain 20 Faith whenever a follower is sacrificed.

leftBranch.name: Respect Your Elders
leftBranch.description: Gain 10 Faith when a Follower becomes an elder.

rightBranch.name: Belief in Afterlife
rightBranch.description: Death is not the end. When a Follower dies only lose -5 faith instead of -20.

rightBranch.name: Good Die Young
rightBranch.description: Gain 10 Faith if an elder is sacrificed, murdered or consumed, but lose 20 Faith if an elder dies naturally.

leftBranch.name: Materialistic
leftBranch.description: Gain Faith when building better sleeping quarters.

leftBranch.name: Sacral Architecture
leftBranch.description: Gain 5 Faith when a building is constructed.

rightBranch.name: False Idols
rightBranch.description: Gain 7 Faith when a decoration is built.

rightBranch.name: Devotee
rightBranch.description: Gain more Faith when you give a sermon.

leftBranch.name: Belief in Original Sin
leftBranch.description: All are born guilty. Reduced Faith loss when putting a Follower in jail who is not dissenting.

rightBranch.name: Absolution
rightBranch.description: Freedom above all else. Every day that begins without anyone in prison, gain +10 Faith.

leftBranch.name: Cannibal
leftBranch.description: Gain +5 Faith when a Follower eats a meal made from Follower meat.

leftBranch.name: Substances Encouraged
leftBranch.description: Gain 20 Faith when Brainwashing Ritual is performed.

rightBranch.name: Grass Eater
rightBranch.description: No longer lose Faith when a follower eats a Grass Meal.

rightBranch.name: Prohibitionist
rightBranch.description: Work speed and devotion generation increased by 10%, but 50% chance of Followers becoming sick after the Brainwashing ritual.
